extendedInfo.description: The *ORIGINAL* Traffic Rush from Donut Games is now on Google Play, yay!RUSH HOUR is approaching and the traffic intensity is rising!Get into the flow by strategically directing rushing vehicles that are crossing the intersection.The rules are really easy, but keeping the roads and tracks CRASH FREE isn't.We dare you to play Traffic Rush!* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *TRAFFIC RUSH includes both the CAR MODE, the first traffic control game of its kind and ALL-TIME PAID IPHONE APP nominee, and the TRAIN MODE that was added later to raise the fun factor even higher.Now also updated to take advantage of the multitude of aspect ratios available on Android.Enjoy!

reviews.title: Not bad.
reviews.comment: Good game but the ads are affecting the gameplay. I can\'t swipe the cars coming from the top in classic mode without touching the ad.
reviews.author: Amanda Cheah

reviews.title: Great except for...
reviews.comment: Totally identical to the iOS version except for the constant nagging advertisement bar on top. It hinders the game and crashes become too frequent but I guess you guys deserve it. Well done lads.
reviews.author: Usman Nagi

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love all the donut games cant wait till they release all of them. I always pay the 99 cents to remove adds worth it to support a great developer. People need to stop being so cheap and crying about the adds its only 99 cents.
reviews.author: Dean Drey

reviews.title: Hmm.
reviews.comment: I used to play this game when i had an iPod & i loved it, but the reason I\'m giving two stars is because as soon as I got the game, it was force closing each time! The calibration is waaaaay off too. You guys really need to fix that for phones with smaller screens.
reviews.author: Amber Kinsey

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: You make a great game and then ruin it by placing the Ads over the top of mini games. I understand why you have the Ads but please move them to a location that doesn\'t effect game play.
reviews.author: Michael Lewis

reviews.title: Thank You Donut Games
reviews.comment: Finally you guys made the move to Android, you guys make some of my favorite games for mobile. Quick and easy to pick up and play and plenty addictive! Continue to port your classics on over! Also please move or make the ad smaller its constantly getting in the way of my vehicles!!!
reviews.author: Ethan Wynsma

reviews.title: Good but adds aren\'t adds....
reviews.comment: Great game! Has a few bugs, but for the games amzingness its good! But the adds are not adds, its just a black thing saying how to remove them, even with an active connection to internet......
reviews.author: Owen Stillman

reviews.title: Yay
reviews.comment: Finally for android I play this all the time on my dads ipod can\'t wait to play on my phone this is a fun game its just that I don\'t mind ads but it gets in the way of cars and trains rushing from the bottom
reviews.author: Nelly Lane

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Donut games are great but can you make all the donut games on apple available on android please.
reviews.author: Joanna Bailey

reviews.title: Cool but...big BUT....
reviews.comment: Cool BUT on the samsung galaxy poket the place the where it swipes is left and up from where my finger is placed......FIX PLEASE...Otherwise 5 stars!
reviews.author: Nico Smit

reviews.title: Add placement
reviews.comment: Can barley play the game because of the placement and timing of these adds. I\'m fine with adds as long as they don\'t hinder the gameplay. Would rather them show up before or after the games and leave the screen open during play
reviews.author: Jesse Liptak

reviews.title: It\'s good but..
reviews.comment: I love this game but there are to many ads. They get in the way and than I crash. Other than that it\'s good.
reviews.author: Cassidy Parsons

reviews.title: Ezhil HTC wildfire s
reviews.comment: I finished 26 achievements out of 28 and I didn\'t know how to spawn the vehicle ... Anyone suggest me to finish that ...
reviews.author: Ezhil arasan

reviews.title: I give 1 star
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t open in my screen I download this because I think this app was great.
reviews.author: Ariannamarie Bee

reviews.title: Woa...
reviews.comment: This game is just... \303\266 ... great. No other traffic rush game can beat it. Recommended to anyone.
reviews.author: Jordon Gimbird

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Its is good for passing time but my only complaint is that the cars sometimes hit the brake instead speeding across the screen. Therefore the detection could be better. But overall its a good game.
reviews.author: Daniel Smith

reviews.title: Difficult controls
reviews.comment: Easy to stop any vehicle of my choice. Darn near impossible to accelerate any vehicle of my choice. Swipe, swipe, SWIPE darn it.... vehicle crash!!! The ads do get in the way. I do enjoy \"traffic crash\" more than this game.
reviews.author: David Kyle

reviews.title: Train mode is worst
reviews.comment: I played this game in my apple ipod and it was lovely.  But in android the train mode is not working properly.  If I swipe the game hanged and ending up with force shutdown.
reviews.author: Gopinath PR

reviews.comment: I liked the game very much it is servealy buggy. when try stopping a car it stops a different one hens I lose. its fun to play and I\'m keeping the game so that if my problem is fixed I can play
reviews.author: Sam knueppel

reviews.title: Dislike the ads. ANNOYING!
reviews.comment: The game itself is fun. I like the game. But, the problem for me is, THEY WANT ME TO PAY to remove the ads ? Uhh, NO!  I can\'t even see when my vehicle is coming out. Seriously, this is ridiculous.
reviews.author: karrie diamond
